Package pandemicGame

Class PandemicGame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
animation.AbstractAnimation
pandemicGame.PandemicGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
public class PandemicGame
extends AbstractAnimation
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
Creates a PandemicGame. This game contains all of the game logic. It creates objects on the screen, sets up various game screens, and allows gameplay.
Author:
Anisha Johnson with Amy Wang, Anna Pickett, and Gloria Kodua
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • drawPolygon

      public java.awt.Polygon drawPolygon​(int shiftInX)
      Draws a representation of one life This method creates a drawing that represents a life that the player has left. The life will look exactly like the doctor object.
      Parameters:
      shiftInX - - the x coordinate at which the leftmost point will be drawn
      Returns:
      a Polygon object
